name: The Backrooms Deluxe
description:
Discover various levels of danger while trying to escape the eerily familiar backrooms based on popular creepypasta lore.

New and Unique Levels

Traverse through 15+ unique levels based on the Backrooms lore. Regular content updates will add even more levels. Each level features a different way to escape, with various dangers along the way.

Scary Entities

In The Backrooms Deluxe, there are many entities blocking your way of finally exiting the backrooms. Each of the entities has its own appearance and mechanics

Join the official Discord Server for updates about it! (updates will still be posted on Steam but the discord server has sneak peeks about it)

Hit wishlist down below, early access is coming the 1st of September
